title: Soba
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar Soba operates several locations. Makes Pan-Asian fusion food with an extensive range of dishes. Veg choices in all parts of the menu (starters, sushi, curries, wok dishes, burgers & wraps). This outlet is still open as of Aug 2015.
